public class SiafuGradientCache
extends PersistentCachedMap

This class is identical to PersitentCachedMaps, except that it prints its messages through a Progress interface.

Author:
Miquel Martin

Constructor Detail

SiafuGradientCache

public SiafuGradientCache(java.lang.String basePath,
                          java.lang.String name,
                          int cacheSize,
                          boolean fillCache)
Creates a PersistentCachedMap for the distance Gradients.

Parameters:
basePath - the directory that contains all of the persisted maps
name - the name of the map.
cacheSize - the amount of maps to keep in memory at any time. When this number is reached, the next loaded map will force the oldest one in memory to be removed, becoming only accessible through hard drive read.
fillCache - whether you would like to read the first cacheSize elements from the hard drive and put them in the cache.
See Also:
PersistentCachedMap
Method Detail

fillCache

public void fillCache(int desiredCacheSize)
Load the first desiredCacheSize persisted elements to memory for faster access.

Overrides:
fillCache in class PersistentCachedMap
Parameters:
desiredCacheSize - the number of elements to read
